title: John Boos Butcher block
description: A beautifully worn maple butcher block that has spent most of its life as a side-table and not working in the kitchen.  Regularly oiled and waxed, she's a beauty.  18" x 18" x 10"

title: Teak Coffee Table by Lane
description: A gorgeous vintage Mid-Century Modern teak coffee table with brass accents made by one of the leading furniture makers of the MCM era.

title: Walnut and Ivory Vinyl Loveseat
description: Walnut and Ivory Vinyl MCM loveseat. Dimensions are 46.5" wide x 27" deep x 30" tall. Great for a small apartment.

title: Modern Wood & Metal Bookcase
description: Great looking light wood(maple?) and metal framed bookcase.

title: Mid-Century-Modern vintage dresser set with 2 side tables by Vaughan of Virginia
description: Beautiful dresser, all wood, in decent shape.  One end table needs the top refinished.

title: MCM inspired Wooden Desk from West Elm
description: A really gorgeous MCM inspired desk, tapered legs, file storage purchased new only 1 year ago.

title: Mango wood and Steel standing Desk with stools(West Elm)
description: Modern and industrial inspired standing desk / high-table with 4 industrial stools.  42" high

title: Brass & Glass console table
description: Beautiful glass and brass console table.  Really fits well with a MCM design.  Perfect for use as a TV stand. (West Elm)

title: Vintage Mosaic Tile / Wood / Laminate coffee table
description: This is a one of a kind vintage piece.  tile and laminate top.  Tapered wooden legs.

title: Queen Size Memory foam mattress (LUCID) and steel platform bed.
description: LUCID memory foam queen sized mattress (1.5 year old) and steel platform bed.

title: 32" HP Pavillion QHD wide-viewing angle display
description: Like new 32" QHD monitor, black - Only used a handfull of times.  Purchased 6 months ago for $350.

title: Friedrich 10,000 BTU Wall Unit A/C
description: Used Friedrich AC unit.  Works GREAT, owned for 2 seasons now.  Retails for $550.

title: Eden Pure Gen2 5000BTU Infrared Heater
description: Amazing little infrared heater by Eden Pure.  So effective without generating heat to the touch.
